tier.item: `How is it going with the rice?' (lit.: `What is the rice doing?')
`How is it going with the rice?' (lit.: `What is the rice doing?')

b. iire rehe-so oni vakilii rehe-haa
`We will go, putting (throwing) our cano e to sea.'

`I delivered your film to Ray Gallimore's too (though I didn't give it to him
`I delivered your film to Ray Gallimore's too (though I didn't give it to him
